inputs.name: skipAzureConnection
inputs.label: Skip Azure Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip logging into Azure for recipes that have no azure based deployments

inputs.name: azureConnection
inputs.label: Azure Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure resource manager subscription for the deployment

inputs.name: envName
inputs.label: Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is not assigned, will look for the pipeline variable: BAKE_ENV_NAME

inputs.name: envCode
inputs.label: Environment Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is not assigned, will look for the pipeline variable: BAKE_ENV_CODE

inputs.name: envRegions
inputs.label: Deployment Regions
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is not assigned, will look for the pipeline variable: BAKE_ENV_REGIONS

inputs.name: useKubernetes
inputs.label: Deploy to a Kubernetes Cluster
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bundle the kubernetes config (must run k8 task login first) into the deployment

inputs.name: kubeConfigToken
inputs.label: Token Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: name of the BAKE varibale to store the kube config content

inputs.name: rootCaFile
inputs.label: Root CA File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional file path to a root CA PEM file to be used by node in bake

inputs.name: recipe
inputs.label: Bake Recipe Docker Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Either define a recipe docker tag, or use the field below to define the Devops artifact bake.artifact file

inputs.name: recipeArtifact
inputs.label: Bake Recipe Artifact File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to an attached Devops bake.artifact file from an attached Artifact drop. If not defined, Recipe field above is used
